thread.title: Canadian Utilities & Telecom Income Fund Declares Monthly Fund Distribution

author: cnbc.com
title: Canadian Utilities & Telecom Income Fund Declares Monthly Fund Distribution

organizations.name: canadian utilities & telecom income fund de

text:
TORONTO, April 03, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- (TSX:UTE.UN) Canadian Utilities & Telecom Income Fund declares a monthly fund distribution in the amount of $0.05238 per unit, payable on April 30, 2018 to unitholders of record on April 13, 2018.
For further information, please contact Investor Relations at 416.681.3966, toll free at 1.800.725.7172 or visit www.strathbridge.com .
John Germain, Senior Vice-President & CFO Strathbridge Asset Management Inc. 121 King Street West Suite 2600 Toronto, Ontario, M5H 3T9 416.681.3966; 1.800.725.7172 www.strathbridge.com info@strathbridge.com
Source: Canadian Utilities & Telecom Income Fund
